root.name: Montage 2D
root.description: Displays 3D data as 2D montages of all slices.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 0.1.0.0 Date 2013-11-12 13:36:33
Upgraded to Icy 1.4 (fixes a bug in the montage viewer)
- Version 0.0.2.0 Date 2013-02-21 12:50:16
Display an error message if the data format is not supported
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2011-11-25 18:42:13
